articles.author: Chan Ho-him
articles.title: High-end car sales sink in China as its economy slows, taking a toll on European automakers - AP News
articles.description: Chinese demand for foreign luxury cars is waning as customers opt for more affordable Chinese brand models. Those are often sold at big discounts catering to their taste for fancy electronics and comfort. That is bad news for European carmakers like Porsche, …
articles.content: HONG KONG (AP) Chinese demand for foreign luxury cars is waning as customers opt for more affordable Chinese brand models, often sold at big discounts, catering to their taste for fancy electronics a… [+4895 chars]

articles.author: Scott Roxborough
articles.title: David Ellison’s Netflix Scare Tactic Runs Into European Reality - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Paramount pitches Netflix as a European Union nonstarter, but regulators seem unfazed — and Trump may be the only audience that matters.
articles.content: In his pitch to Warner Bros. Discovery shareholders to accept Paramount Skydance’s $108 billion hostile takeover bid, David Ellison has repeatedly argued that European regulators will never allow Net… [+7515 chars]
